author: liyin
msg: Instead of setting stopRow equals to startRow, stopRow is set to the
next value greater than startRow, i.e. with an extra trailing ZERO.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-9896] Adding functionality to take filter string and also be able to read from snapshot.
Summary: This diff adds the functionality to provide the filter string and snapshot to TableMapReduceUtils.
Test Plan: Run Unit tests and visually verify the logs.

author: liyin
msg: [HBASE-9896] Fix the end row bug in the TableInputFormatBase
In case the the endrow is not specified, the end row is taken from the
HexSplit Class, which defaults it to 'ffffffff'. This will exclude all
the rows starting with ffffffff and after. The fix honors the endrow
from the config instead of using the one from the HexSplit Class.
Test Plan: MR unit tests, and custom job
